WRITING.TEXT: I am in australia (western side) we are pretty isolated and had loiked into usa and china but usa was $600+ postage fir 5-10 decks... then i found a local company in Western Australia called Folklore... they do their own boards but sell blank decks to feckless drecks like me with uber fast shipping... (thats the killer here slooow shipping)
Ooh keep the glass bits and set them in a table top of acrylic/ resin / adamantium

Yeah I love a) the mountability.. i use a docking system that mounts them nicely. B) the grain and colour.. not being paper seams to change how i draw... and c) i can work on them anywhere, hang with partner in lounge etc instead of being isolated in the studio (familiy/work/art balance is hard)
Funny i live in australia but have had his name come up many times...
Love seeing his stuff pop up and brighten my day
